articles.title: Indian-American Named Co-Chair Of President-Elect Joe Biden's COVID Task Force - NDTV
articles.description: Indian-American Vivek Murthy on Monday was named one of the three co-chairs of the COVID-19 Advisory Board that will guide President-elect Joe Biden on dealing with the coronavirus pandemic that has claimed over 236,000 lives in the country.
articles.content:
Vivek Murthy has been as one of the three co-chairs of the COVID-19 Advisory Board.

articles.title: Coronavirus: Freight drivers added to rules on Denmark travel due to mink COVID concerns - Sky News
articles.description: Denmark orders all 15 million mink bred in the country be culled after the discovery of a coronavirus mutation.
